line.originaltext: 1 (9 ounce) package refrigerated small cheese tortellini
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Add these, then simmer until tender, 10-20 minutes: 1 9-ounce package refrigerated small cheese tortellini; 1 14.5-ounce can diced tomatoes; 2 medium zucchini, diced; 1 tsp. dried basil.
line.annotation: combine({ing90, ing91, ing92, ing93, ing97}, ing98, "soup mix", "")

line.originaltext: Add these, then simmer until tender, 10-20 minutes: 1 9-ounce package refrigerated small cheese tortellini; 1 14.5-ounce can diced tomatoes; 2 medium zucchini, diced; 1 tsp. dried basil.
line.annotation: cook(ing98, , ing99, "simmered mix", "simmer until tender, 10-20 minutes")

line.originaltext: Add these, then simmer until tender, 10-20 minutes: 1 9-ounce package refrigerated small cheese tortellini; 1 14.5-ounce can diced tomatoes; 2 medium zucchini, diced; 1 tsp. dried basil.
Before removing from heat, stir in: 1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley.
line.annotation: combine({ing94, ing99}, ing100, "parslied mix", "stir in parsley")

line.originaltext: Final touch: Add salt and pepper, to taste.
